title: Bug 116829 - Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description:
Description: When modifying the font size of a label, the label's height does not change immediately.

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Add a label
2. Modify the label's font size to "18 points"
OB: When modifying the font size of a label, the height remains unchanged.
EB: The label's height should adjust according to the new font size.
SR:
1. Add a label
2. Modify the label's font size to "18 points"
